p:
Thirteen plasma specimens were collected between 2001 and 2006 from HIV-1-positive individuals participating in viral diversity studies in Cameroon and the DRC ( Table 1). The specimens came from blood donors or participants seeking voluntary testing as previously described.
16, 24 The DRC study was approved by the University of Missouri-Kansas City Research Board. The Cameroon study was approved by the Cameroon National Ethical Review Board, the Faculty of Medicine and Biomedical Science Institutional Review Boards (IRB), and the Ministry of Health of Cameroon.
